sections.description: An easy to use pin code plugin to access the full site.
sections.installation: Install zip file and click activate
sections.changelog:
2.7 Resolved bug where update checks were being triggered on each page refresh

2.6 Add a sign-in event after a successful pin code submission

2.5 Resolved a bug where the Enter button wouldn't submit the PIN code form

2.4 Fixes conflict with Store Location Plugin

v2.2 released on July 26th, 2023

  • Add automatic updater
